long_description: These action-inspired Smith Terrace polarized sunglasses feature sleek surfacing and a fast profile to handle whatever curves your day throws you. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Carbonic TLT lenses provide 100% UVA/B/C protection and incorporate Smith Tapered Lens Technology(TM) to optimize viewing clarity. Tapered Lens Technology contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion. 8 base-curve lens: the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. Frames are made from bio-plastic Rilsan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, consistent fit. Black frames feature polarized gray green lenses to reduce reflected glare and sharpen detail. Mahogany frames feature polarized brown lenses, ideal for medium to bright conditions, that reduce glare and enhance contrast while maintaining true colors. Megol nose pads and temple ends keep glasses in place when the temperature rises. Lightweight frames have a medium fit with large coverage. Smith Terrace polarized sunglasses come with a coconut fiber storage bag.
short_description: These action-inspired Smith Terrace polarized sunglasses feature sleek surfacing and a fast profile to handle whatever curves your day throws you.
